title: How to Configure and Use Your Own Chainlink Node And External Adapter In Your EZChain dApp
description: This tutorial will show you how to setup a Chainlink node with the EZChain Fuji Testnet and create dApp smart contracts utilizing a Chainlink node.

frontMatter.description: This tutorial will show you how to setup a Chainlink node with the EZChain Fuji Testnet and create dApp smart contracts utilizing a Chainlink node.
